name: Your Favorite Dance
description:
Your Favorite Dance is a a rhythm reflex game where you dance to your favorite song trying to gather a crowd. 


How to play:

Press the arrow keys or ASDW to choose the dance move. Try to match the dance move with the incoming wall.

Regular mode - A good practice mode, see if you can get to the end of the song.

Infinity mode - Dance as long as you can to stay on the stage.


Credits:

Björn - Most of it

Software used:

Unity
Odin Inspector
Pyxel Edit
BandLab
Photoshop
